translation: Pth ts shkhṣs khạṭr chhe hlakt yus (buthis pytth) pamh votur krn vvl chuh (th ptụ̄ kinụ̄) ʿīb phirn vvl chuh.
(khrạby th tbạhy chhe ts shkhṣs khạṭr) yymụ̄ mal jmʿ kor byyh chuh tath gnzrụ̄ gnzrụ̄ thavan.
Suh chuh yhi gman kran zi tmụ̄ snz dvlt thavi ts hmyshh zndh.
Hrgz nh!suh yiyhi ẓrvrḥṭmh hs (yʿny chvur chvur krn vạlis nars) mnz chhknh.
Th tohyhi kya chuhv smjh mut ziḥṭmh (chvur chvur krn vvl nar) kya chuh?
(yhi) chuh Allah tʿālyā sund grmavnh āmut nar.
Yus diln pytth (pnnhi tklyf san) khshi.
Be shk yiyhi suh (nar) timn lukn pytth pth ṭrfh bnd krnh.
(dazvnyn shʿln hndyn) zytthyn zytthyn thmn mnz (th timn lukn khạṭr rvzi nh kanhh czlnch vath)
